Reviews.Title: Gotta Have One!
Reviews.Author: Johnson Cannon "Guardian95"
Reviews.Content: For the money it simply performs well and delivers excellent quality video. I would definitely recommend this cam! Get it.

Reviews.Title: not happy
Reviews.Author: seyit
Reviews.Content: before i bought this product i watched several you tube video reviews of this product. none of them had any lag in the video. it is easy set up as the others said. but i am not really thrilled with it because of the video lag. i tried to playback on different PC's and different media players, it really doesn't make a difference. there is an annoying lag in the video. i tried changing the settings too, used different sd cards. none of it works for me.

Reviews.Title: Satisfied Beyond Expectations
Reviews.Author: Jeremy
Reviews.Content: Package comes with everything you physically need to get your dash cam up and running, except the microSD card. You may need to install the free setup software from the BuyMobius website, to help with added features (I recommend!). You can also download the PDF manual there. They recommend a PC for Mobius setup, but there's also an Android app for mobile users. Kit comes with tools to take apart the device to explore other mounting solutions for your vehicle. Package arrives safely and quicker than expected. I may buy another from this merchant in the future!

Reviews.Title: good dash and sport cam
Reviews.Author: Cole Brooks
Reviews.Content: I've been testing this for a few weeks now. I've been using it as a dash cam for the most part, but it's portable and I've used it to record a couple company meetings and some outdoor family activities too.Pros -- easy setup, easy to use.- clean clear images even at high res mode.- very nice camera for it's size and price, barely bigger than a matchbox.COns -- none yet

Reviews.Title: Very nice camera for action sports!
Reviews.Author: MI6.007
Reviews.Content: I ordered this cam by Novotm thru Amazon here and opted for the free shipping. I am supposed to get the camera on Friday the 23rd but instead got it on the 19th... what a pleasant surprise! The camera works great. Video quality is amazing both indoor and outdoor. Couple of things you must know: there are 2 usb wires that come with the camera... a long one and a short one. The long wire is for the car I suppose. When you connect the camera to pc with the long wire, PC won't read the camera as a drive but will only charge it. You need the short wire to connect with the pc. I also used msetup.zip program to configure my camera. You can edit the modes on the camera as well which is great (yellow-1/blue-2 mode). Since I don't have any use for the 720P recording on blue mode I changed it to regular recording with 1080p. But I changed mode 1 to upside down (180 degrees) and wide angle recording for the car. Yes I don't have the wide angle lens but it can do wide angle as well! I also connected this camera with my android galaxy note 3 using the short wire and a usb connecter and the phone can read it as a usb drive. You can also download a free app called aMCA Mobius AC for android (not sure if it's available for iPhone but a simple app search should let you know) and change the setting on the camera thru there instead of a computer.Overall I'm pretty satisfied with this camera and the vendor's shipping time out to me was amazing!

Reviews.Title: Great camera for the price
Reviews.Author: Mark Fehrenbach
Reviews.Content: This camera has great picture quality, could be a bit bigger if you have large fingers to operate the buttons.

Reviews.Title: Great little camera
Reviews.Author: Amazon Customer
Reviews.Content: I don't know how much more I could add that the other reviewers have already said.  I have another dashcam with a screen and it works well, but I like this one so much better because of the size.  The picture quality is great and the setup is easy with the downloaded program.Don't underestimate how hot this thing gets.  You cannot leave it running in a hot car on a sunny day.  Burn your fingers hot!  Still a great camera though.

Reviews.Title: This is a fantastic little camera!
Reviews.Author: Stanley Tang
Reviews.Content: I have been using this for the past few days as a dash cam, I must say that this is one of the better camera on the market. Great image and audio quality, in a fantastically small size (about the size of a box of TicTac). The best part is the price, which is very good value for what you get.Pro:- Very good value for the price- Small size and light weight- Excellent overall image and video quality- Decent Battery life (when fully charged)Con:- Low light video quality could be better- I wish Battery life could stretch a bit longer from a single charged- Instruction manual could use some improvement- Better support for the camera configuration softwareOverall, this is a great camera (especially use as a dash cam), with good value.

Reviews.Title: Just GREAT
Reviews.Author: naswingman
Reviews.Content: Very easy ti install (mine is at the top of the windshield next to the mirror). Set-up went well with the downloaded program. Picture quality is very good.

ProductInfo.Features:
3 video recording rates: 1080 @ 30 fps, 720 @ 60 fps, or 720 @ 30 fps.
Mounts as removable storage on PC/Mac/Linux for easy video transfer.
Internal, rechargeable, lithium battery provides up to 80 minutes of recording per charge.
Fully configurable via free PC configuration tool, Android App, or by manually editing the configuration text file (PC/Mac/Linux).
Camera weighs 1.37 oz (39 g) without mounting sleeve / 1.74 oz (50 g) with mounting sleeve.
Standard lens approx. FoV:  86 degrees (1080p) / 46 degrees (720p).
Supports a microSD card up to 32GB in size.  Class 4 recommended.
Includes 32GB Kingston Class 4 microSD card in retail packaging.
